name: Pixel Parchment UI Kit
description:
The Pixel Parchment UI Kit is a completely free UI set which can be used by any one (including both commercial and non commercial projects) to create their games with.
This game comes pre-coded into Ren'Py - so you don't have to code anything if you don't want to! 

The download includes:

  • PNG Files of all art assets used
  • PSD file with all of the menu screens & layers
  • Game files for Windows, Linux, and Mac users
  • Original Ren'Py files
  • Instructions on where to find and download all of the assets used in the kit 

The Pixel Parchment UI Kit includes menus for:

  • Start Screen
  • Save / Load Screens
  • Character Select Screen
  • Settings
  • Are you sure - Yes/No - Quit Menus
  • Credits Menus

The screen resolution for this game is 480px x 321px.
